heartlesspursuit.midnightconfig.title: Heartless Pursuit Config
heartlesspursuit.midnightconfig.LEVEL_IN: Set the level interval for how many levels should give hearts.
heartlesspursuit.midnightconfig.HEALTH_P: Set how many hearts each level interval gives. (2 = 1 heart)
heartlesspursuit.midnightconfig.XP_STEAL: Set a percentage of how much XP you get from a kill. (0 = disabled)
